name: RPB_Game
description:
A prototype of the game. The main idea is to be a bee getting pollen from a flower to bring back to the hive. Super basic right now! Will update the game in the future!

Updates:

  • Updated Balance! Will continue to work on it during the summer.

Updates (Older):

  • Added Main Menu, with options to quit and go to level.
  • Updated graphics
  • Difficulty goes up to 2 now. When you fill the hive, you increase in difficulty.
  • Added Lives.
  • Added Timer, added flower movement.
  • Added 1 enemy death sprite.
  • Added Pollen decay, as well as the increase in gathering pollen the longer you stay on your flower.
  • Starting to add a pattern based system.
  • Pattern based system implemented. MIGHT be a little bullet hell-ish.
  • You get slower when you're holding more pollen.
  • You can turn left and right now.
  • Added animations!
  • Added Difficulty 3 and 4
  • Balance changes
  • Added title!
  • Added victory screen!
  • Added sound and credits! More enemies! More animations!
